entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this morning. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. Forecast issued 06:17 AM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
